description: Light up the maps of the following areas in Sumeru: Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.

achievement: Descending Into the Depths of Desolation
description: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following areas in Sumeru: Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.
Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Sumeru: Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.

Follow 8 Seelie in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert to their Seelie Courts.
Follow 16 Seelie in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert to their Seelie Courts.
Open a total of 40 treasure chests in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.
Open a total of 80 treasure chests in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.
Open a total of 160 treasure chests in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.
Complete a total of 4 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.
Complete a total of 8 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.
Complete a total of 16 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert.
Upgrade the Amrita Pool to its maximum level.
